Hi,

sorry this is not a proper bug report but I'm in the middle of  
something and just need to get my thoughts down:

from org.archive.net.UURIFactory

if (uriPath != null) {
                 // Eliminate '..' if its first thing in the path.   
IE does this.
                 uriPath = TextUtils.replaceFirst(SLASHDOTDOTSLASH,  
uriPath,
                     SLASH);
             }

from my archive:

<link media="screen" href="http://crawls.archive.org/ukgov/ 
20060605094313/http://www.mod.uk/styles/homepage.css" type="text/css"  
rel="stylesheet" />

from the original site:

<link media="screen" href="../styles/homepage.css" type="text/css"  
rel="stylesheet" />

actual location of CSS:

http://www.mod.uk/defenceinternet/styles/homepage.css

It looks like it is just dropping out the ".." instead of resolving  
it. I notice that the code doesn't do quite what the comments imply.

I'll come back to this later. maybe with a patch if I have time.

Can't stop indexes to build :-)

-mark
